scripts.name: google news
scripts.script:
/**
 **
 **     DATA PROCESSING SCRIPT: google news
 **     SERVICE: http://localhost:8098
 **
 **/

service.google.news(<? $scope.keywords.join(" ") ?>)
set(var:"docs",value:"articles")
get("docs")
// service.uri.info(selector:["url"])

scripts.name: geo
scripts.script:
/**
 **
 **     DATA PROCESSING SCRIPT: geo
 **     SERVICE: http://localhost:8098
 **
 **/

get("data")
service.uri.info(selector:["url"])

c.group(by:<? 
    item => item.url.countryCode
?>)

c.map(<? 
    item => ({
        selector:item.group,
        name:item.values[0].url.country,
        value:item.values.length
    })
?>)

dict.countries.map(from:"alpha2", to:"alpha3", field:"selector")
dict.countries.map(from:"alpha3", to:"name", source:"selector", dest:"name",lang:"uk")

set("data")
<?javascript
    $scope.result = {
        serie: $scope.data
    }
?>

return("result")

scripts.name: sources
scripts.script:
/**
 **
 **     DATA PROCESSING SCRIPT: sources
 **     SERVICE: http://localhost:8098
 **
 **/

get("data")

c.group(by:<? 
    item => item.source.name
?>)

c.map(<? 
    item => ({
        source: item.group,
        value: item.values.length
    })
?>)

c.order(by:"value")
set("data")
<?javascript
    $scope.result = {
	"legend": [
		"Source Activity"
	],
	"yAxis": $scope.data.map( d=> d.source),
	"series": [
		{
			"name": "Source Activity",
			"type": "bar",
			"data": $scope.data.map( d=> d.value)
		}
	]
}

?>
 return("result")

scripts.name: pulse
html
scripts.script:
/** ** ** DATA PROCESSING SCRIPT: html ** SERVICE: http://localhost:8098 ** **/ ${title}
${description}
Published by ${source.name} at ${publishedAt}
?> set("template") News feed (${total} items)
${content}
?> set("outer") { d.publishedAt = moment(new Date(d.publishedAt)).format("YYYY.MM.DD HH:mm") return d }) let t = _.template($scope.template) let o = _.template($scope.outer) $scope.res = o({content:$scope.data.map( d => t(d) ).join(" "), total:$scope.data.length}) ?> return("res") text()
